jobs.description: Development tasks related to a suite of “Illustration” software at Canada Life, used to “Illustrate” customer insurance policies.
accomplishments: Manage effort across multiple projects with conflicting timelines in a demanding environment tracking my efforts and responsibilities with JIRA
Work directly with business to help set and understand requirements, work with Project Managers to deliver on various projects, and through Confluence to collaborate with stakeholders at all levels
Communicate with PM, Sponsor, Business Manager regularly with updates and to resolve issues
Respond to bugfix, hotfix and incidents to resolve complex problems
Development and testing of features, components committing regularly to Bitbucket
Look for opportunities to create documentation and Job Aids related to software, as well as provide all documentation to projects as required (T2M, Estimates, ARP’s, etc.)
Work with other developers both on shore and off in a lead developer capacity
Team security coordinator, disaster recovery team
Provide detailed estimates for development effort
Migrate and update legacy software, coordinate exception requests and manage same
Monitor, deploy and support web applications across 4 environments Served from IIS on Windows 2019 Server, Monitored by Splunk/AppDynamics
Request, deploy, configure and support Servers, Network devices, test machines, Firewalls, Firewall rules, CSS certs, Ansible Playbooks, Ansible Inventory, Security/Vulnerability scans
Manage Change and Change requests related to Projects and 3rd party change requests that affect supported applications
Work with Developers, Technicians, Architects, Specialists to support everything above
